CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 1, 1954, pg. 14 reads: "Brick Masons At Work On Belmar Gardens - Belmar Gardens, the 118-unit cooperative housing development in Twelfth Ward, is providing employment for some Negro skilled workers as the building progresses...At the lower left, William A. Harris works with Frank LeDonne on scaffolding...All the bricklayers are members of the Bricklayers International Union, Local No. 2.. Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: William A. Harris and Frank LeDonne building scaffolding atop unfinished brick structure in Belmar Gardens
